text: Basi (Allah) M’mbujegwe wampochele kapochele kambone, soni ni wankusisye kakusye kambone, ni wantesile Zakariya kuwa nkunchengeta jwakwe. Ndawi ni katema kawaliji Zakariya ali nkun'jinjilila (Maryamujo) ku chigunguli cha mu nsikitimo, waliji nkuisimana kwa jwalakwejo yakulya. Watiji (pakum'busya): “E Maryam! Kwapi nkuipata ayi?” Jwalakwe jwatiji: “Yalakweyi yikutyochela kwa Allah. Chisimu Allah akumpaga lisiki jwansachile mwangawalanjila.”
